SColoredBar - Class in re.alwyn974.swinger.colored
The SColoredBar A colored bar with text.
SColoredBar(Color) - Constructor for class re.alwyn974.swinger.colored.SColoredBar
The SColoredBar The background color of the bar will be the given background color, and the foreground color will be the background color but a little brighter.

SColoredButton(Color) - Constructor for class re.alwyn974.swinger.colored.SColoredButton
The SColoredButton When the mouse will be on the button, the button will be a little more white, and when it will be disabled, it will be a little more gray.
SColoredButton(Color, Color) - Constructor for class re.alwyn974.swinger.colored.SColoredButton
The SColoredButton When the mouse will be on the button, the button texture will become the given 'colorHover' color, and when it will be disabled, it will be a little more gray.
SColoredButton(Color, Color, Color) - Constructor for class re.alwyn974.swinger.colored.SColoredButton
The SColoredButton When the mouse will be on the button, the button texture will become the given 'colorHover' color, and when it will be disabled, the texture will become the given 'colorDisabled' color.
